title: Keep Disconnecting from Lobby
body:
So f**king tired of losing series from lobby disconnections. I am able to connect to chrome/IE/Firefox during the lobby fine with no lag. This is absolute crap.

Windows 10 64-Bit like that f**king matters.

replies.body:
have been disconnecting for the past 30 min or so as well

"edit" I have not even attempted to play just watching LCS with no problems on that end but the league client keeps dc every minute or so. tested internet connection and its been stable all morning and afternoon

you aren't the only one buddy, me and my duo just got disconnected from pvp client. My internet is stabilized and i didn't lose connection from anything else either. 


**edit: it has been happening each queue we've been. played 3 games and were on our 4th when we got disconnected**

Been happening to me and I have literally never disconnected form a game/client/lobby before. Just lost 3lp for a dodge cause of it.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MzHuldRv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-28T18:50:49.374+0000)
>
> It sucks to get an auto-loss like that after you've worked so hard to get into your series, and I'm sorry it happened.  I'd like to help get it fixed up and hopefully prevent it in the future, and any info does matter!  Even though you are able to use your browsers just fine, it looks like your connection is unstable enough to get left behind in champion select.  
> 
> As a first step, remove any third party programs that interact with league as they've been known to cause issues at this point.  Beyond that, run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and strengthen comms to our servers.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Porocles, there is something wrong with the client or server connection. I am not the only one experiencing this issue and apparently it's been going on for the last 8 or so hours.

Rito needs to gather data on the nature of the disconnects. Clearly there is an issue happening with disconnects right now. He's not trying to blame you or be dismissive, just gather information so they can start narrowing down what exactly the issue is.
Hey there, I've seen a few reports on what you're saying and looking into it.  The OP's post may not be related to it, but I'll keep you posted if I find anything.
Are we going to get our series/LP back? I'm am sitting at 65 LP instead of in series for G1 because of this. That's 4 straight wins I have to get instead of 2

I could see replying that if it wasn't a mass spread problem... this has got to be a server side issue if it is continuing to happen to so many people.  I run a leagues for all elos and we are nearly on the verge of telling 30 teams they wont be playing this weekend if it continues to happen.
Yup, looking into these reports now and will let you know what I find.
It is definitely server-side. Everyone I know is being repeatedly disconnected.
Experiencing the same Disconnect. Its not my internet as I pay for business class internet stability. So how about you tell me again how unstable your client is?

have talked with several of friends from all over US and seems that most are having issues but not in game only outside of actual matches. Several have been DC'd from champ select but none from actual in game as of yet.
This just started happening to me and my friends seem to be fine, but others we play with are experiencing this problem. Currently at a 30 min dodge timer and afraid to even play.

Just want to add another voice to this growing list. Seems like this problem has been going on for a few years with no real attention or solution from Rito. 

I'm Windows 8, 64-bit, and I'm having problems disconnecting from the champ select lobby after I click the "Ready" button to get into a lobby. No problems in game, (aside from keys randomly not working)  though.

To all people experiencing this problem, I recommend you do not queue for ranked games at the very least. All you will be doing is screwing up your LP. Just wait for them to admit they have an issue and go play another game while they lose profits. All you can do really.
